test_bank.title: Sample Test Bank
test_bank.description: This is a sample test bank with questions and answers. Replace this with your actual test bank data.
test_bank.certification_details: CompTIA Security+ is a globally recognized certification that validates the baseline skills necessary to perform core security functions and pursue an IT security career.

questions.question_text: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital and largest city of France. It is located in the north-central part of the country.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are programming languages?
questions.explanation: Python, JavaScript, and Java are all programming languages. HTML is a markup language, not a programming language.

questions.question_text: Django is a Python web framework.
questions.explanation: Django is indeed a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
